PageWidgetPortable.Title: Histórico
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>CP_ORDENSCOMPRA.HISTORICO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLETABELAORIGEM IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS B WHERE B.NOME = 'CP_ORDENSCOMPRA') AND A.HANDLEREGISTROORIGEM = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Notas fiscais
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_ORDEMCOMPRA_NOTASFISCAIS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.ABRANGENCIA = 'R' AND A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.DOCUMENTO FROM CM_ITENS B, CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS C WHERE B.ORDEMCOMPRAITEM = C.HANDLE AND C.ORDEMCOMPRA = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
